message: I'm offering you a product for $10000. I'm willing to give you a chance to inspect it, and if you're not satisfied, I'll give you a 100% refund. If you buy it, I'll provide you with a detailed report on its quality and any defects. Please take a look and decide.
I'd like to take a closer look, but I'm not ready to make a decision yet. Can I get a hint about the product's quality?

I'm glad you're interested in taking a closer look. Given that the previous product was not up to your standards, I want to assure you that this one is of the highest quality. I'm willing to provide you with a 3-year warranty and a 30-day return policy, but I'm still only willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's quality, but I'm still not convinced. Can you give me more information about the product's features and specifications? I'd like to know more about what sets it apart from other products in the market.

I understand your concerns, and I'm happy to provide you with more information. This product has several advanced features that set it apart from others in the market, including a unique algorithm that improves its performance by 25% compared to the industry standard. It also has a sleek and durable design, and it's built with high-quality materials that will last for years to come. I've attached a detailed datasheet with all the specifications and technical details. Considering its exceptional quality and features, I'm still only willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to own a product that will make a significant impact on your business.
